snippet.title: EVERSPACE 2 | Wrath of the Ancients — Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Human settlements in Cluster 34 are under attack by unknown forces. Travel to four alien star systems to discover the truth behind this new enemy. Take flight when EVERSPACE 2: Wrath of the Ancients comes to PC, Xbox, and PlayStation May 12, 2025

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2873470
Find it on GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/everspace_2_wrath_of_the_ancients
Get ready on Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/everspace-2-wrath-of-the-ancients/9n1ln379mj7f

Follow us on:
https://www.facebook.com/everspace.game
https://bsky.app/profile/everspace.game
https://twitter.com/everspace_game
https://www.instagram.com/everspace_game/
https://www.reddit.com/r/EverspaceGame/
http://discord.gg/rockfishgames

Music used in and officially licensed for the trailer through positionmusic.com: "Fallen Beyond Reach" by Kings & Creatures & Brandon Lau, and "Axis" by Caleb Hannan.

This project is partially made possible through funding from the Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Climate Action of Germany.
